item.title: Laravel development
item.description: Laravel is a PHP framework very trend in the world of development. It was created by Taylor Otwell in June 2011. It was immediately adopted by many developers (we are the first) because it is very simple to take in hand, it is provided as a service, unlike the others, it is not a constraint to use it. API development Laravel allows to create an API in a few clicks, it is suitable to make a prototype for startups.
